title: Lion Gaming looking for Mid laner
body:
Hi this is Chewy please comment the following below
- Is your main role mid lane...
- what are your champs
- have you played on a team before and if so how long 
- what positions have you played other then mid
- how long have you played
- Current Rank
- can you play at these times ( Tuesday Thursday 5CNT 6EST)(Friday Saturday 3PM CNT 4 EST)
- do you have mic and teamspeak 
Thank you for you're submission and time see you on the rift - Lion Gaming

replies.body:
Yes
Leblanc, lissandra, orianna, annie, zed, katarina, nidalle, morganna
Yes, 4 months straight, I was the shotcaller and mid laner.
Jungle, adc
Early s2
Silver 4 (Gold MMR)
Yes
Yes
IGN: AlwaysNowhere

Main main role is mid lane
I play mages such as : Annie, Ori, Liss, Vel, anivia
I often play premade 5s with my friends but not very often in ranked
I have played all the positions
I have been playing for 3 years now
Gold 3
Yes i can
Obviously!
I look forward to your invitation.
